quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction specifies the placement and orientation of the ketchup bottle. The question should focus on whether these attributes are correctly implemented.
quality_check_questions.question: Is there a ketchup bottle positioned in the lower-right corner of the image, angled slightly toward the center?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction requires the text "The king of flavors" to be displayed in the middle of the image. The question should verify the presence and location of this text.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the text “The king of flavors” displayed in the middle of the image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction specifies the font style and appearance of the text. The question should check if the text matches the described style.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the text “The king of flavors” crafted in a glossy, ketchup-style script font?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction requires the text to appear as if it is hovering and blending with the mist. The question should evaluate if the text integrates with the scene as described.
quality_check_questions.question: Do the letters of “The king of flavors” appear to hover in the air and subtly mingle with the mist of the forest?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction mandates streams of ketchup linking back to the bottle. The question should confirm the presence and connection of these streams.
quality_check_questions.question: Are there streams of ketchup visually linking back to the opened bottle?
